analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule constitutes a sweeping reclassification of career civil servants in 'policy-influencing' positions into a new category of at-will employees, stripped of long-standing procedural protections under chapters 43 and 75 of Title 5.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about due process, legal precedent, and the erosion of merit-based protections, indicating a clear stance against the politicization of civil service.
